value.description:
A highly potent healing potion.

Consuming the potion will heal the single worst health condition affecting someone at any given time.

Works even on health conditions that would otherwise be incurable. The healing effect can even regenerate missing limbs or organs.

A potion of such potent magic that a few drops placed in the mouth of a corpse can resurrect the dead.

Unfortunately, those brought back may suffer from brain damage, blindness, or progressive madness. They will also experience mild amnesia, forgetting some recent memories and social interactions.

Outcomes are better when used on a fresher body. If a body is preserved, it can even be resurrected long after death.
